name: HipaaBusinessStatusMappings
title: HIPAA/HTTP Business Status Mappings
description: HIPAA/GDPR correction workflow (internally based on an extended set of HTTP response codes)

concept.definition: This is what is currently in the medical record.
An entry was created within the medical record.
The correction request was accepted but not yet acted upon.
The correction request did not contain valid content.
The server asks the client to check the contents and resend the correction request.
The server asks the client to submit the correction request on another URI.
The correction request did not meet requirements to make the necessary changes.
The correction request was made for a patient or resource that the requesting account is not authorized to make changes for. (i.e. wrong patient)
The client does not have access rights to make this correction request.  (i.e. hospital supply management system)
The correction request references errors in the record that cannot be found or replicated.
The correction request specifies changes that don't conform to the servers capabilities.  (i.e. wrong code system)
The correction request requires the sign-off from a proxy, such as the nurse or physician who wrote the note.
The correction request conflicts with the current state of the server (i.e. 2 correction requests for opposite changes)
The correction request failed a precondition, such as a medication statement or records of receipts.
The correction request has a precondition, such as contraindicating lab results or records of receipts.
The correction request was not made due to legal reasons (i.e. mental health laws, incarceration laws, etc)
The correction request was applied as requested.
The correction request was applied as requested with variations.
The correction request was received and rejected.
The correction request was received and rejected with additional information.
The correction request was received and rejected with rebuttal.
